text: Ritika Arun Bhopalkar (born 18 December 1987) is Madhya Pradeshi cricketer. She played for Mumbai, Madhya Pradesh, West Zone and Central Zone. She has played 65 Limited over matches and 30 Women's Twenty20. == References == Category:1987 births Category:Mumbai women cricketers Category:Madhya Pradesh women cricketers Category:West Zone women cricketers Category:Central Zone women cricketers Category:People from Madhya Pradesh Category:Living people
title: Ritika Bhopalkar
